verses.verse: These <S%H428><s%> are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> Simeon, <S%H8095><s%> Levi, <S%H3878><s%> Judah, <S%H3063><s%> Issachar, <S%H3485><s%> Zebulun, <S%H2074><s%>
Dan, <S%H1835><s%> Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> Naphtali, <S%H5321><s%> Gad, <S%H1410><s%> and Asher. <S%H836><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> [were] Er, <S%H6147><s%> Onan, <S%H209><s%> and Shelah; <S%H7956><s%> [these] three <S%H7969><s%> were born <S%H3205><s%> to him by Bath-shua the Canaanitess. <S%H3669><s%> And Er, <S%H6147><s%> Judah's first-born, was wicked <S%H7451><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> so He put <S%H4191><s%> him to death. <S%H4191><s%>
And Tamar <S%H8559><s%> his daughter-in-law bore <S%H3205><s%> him Perez <S%H6557><s%> and Zerah. <S%H2226><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%> had five <S%H2568><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> in all. <S%H3605><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Perez <S%H6557><s%> [were] Hezron <S%H2696><s%> and Hamul. <S%H2538><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zerah <S%H2226><s%> [were] Zimri, <S%H2174><s%> Ethan, <S%H387><s%> Heman, <S%H1968><s%> Calcol, <S%H3633><s%> and Dara; <S%H1873><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> of them in all. <S%H3605><s%>
And the son <S%H1121><s%> of Carmi <S%H3756><s%> [was] Achar, <S%H5917><s%> the troubler <S%H5916><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> who <S%H834><s%> violated <S%H4603><s%> the ban. <S%H9172><s%>
And the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ethan <S%H387><s%> [was] Azariah. <S%H5838><s%>
Now the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hezron, <S%H2696><s%> who <S%H834><s%> were born <S%H3205><s%> to him [were] Jerahmeel, <S%H3396><s%> Ram, <S%H7410><s%> and Chelubai. <S%H3621><s%>

And Ram <S%H7410><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Amminadab, <S%H5992><s%> and Amminadab <S%H5992><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Nahshon, <S%H5177><s%> leader <S%H5387><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Judah; <S%H3063><s%>
Nahshon <S%H5177><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Salma, <S%H8007><s%> Salma <S%H8007><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Boaz, <S%H1162><s%>
Boaz <S%H1162><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Obed, <S%H5744><s%> and Obed <S%H5744><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Jesse; <S%H3448><s%>

and Jesse <S%H3448><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Eliab <S%H446><s%> his first-born, then Abinadab <S%H41><s%> the second, <S%H8145><s%> Shimea <S%H8092><s%> the third, <S%H7992><s%>
Nethanel <S%H5417><s%> the fourth, <S%H7243><s%> Raddai <S%H7288><s%> the fifth, <S%H2549><s%>
Ozem <S%H684><s%> the sixth, <S%H8345><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> the seventh; <S%H7637><s%>

and their sisters <S%H269><s%> [were] Zeruiah <S%H6870><s%> and Abigail. <S%H26><s%> And the three <S%H7969><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zeruiah <S%H6870><s%> [were] Abshai, <S%H52><s%> Joab, <S%H3097><s%> and Asahel. <S%H6214><s%>
And Abigail <S%H26><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> Amasa, <S%H6021><s%> and the father of Amasa <S%H1><s%> was Jether <S%H6021><s%> the Ishmaelite. <S%H3500><s%>

Now Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hezron <S%H2696><s%> had <S%H3205><s%> sons <S%H3205><s%> by Azubah <S%H5806><s%> [his] wife, <S%H802><s%> and by Jerioth; <S%H3408><s%> and these <S%H428><s%> were her sons: <S%H1121><s%> Jesher, <S%H3475><s%> Shobab, <S%H7727><s%> and Ardon. <S%H715><s%>
When Azubah <S%H5806><s%> died, <S%H4191><s%> Caleb <S%H3612><s%> married <S%H3947><s%> Ephrath, <S%H672><s%> who bore <S%H3205><s%> him Hur. <S%H2354><s%>
And Hur <S%H2354><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Uri, <S%H221><s%> and Uri <S%H221><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Bezalel. <S%H1212><s%>

Afterward <S%H310><s%> Hezron <S%H2696><s%> went <S%H935><s%> in to the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Machir <S%H4353><s%> the father of Gilead, <S%H1><s%> whom he married <S%H1568><s%> when he was sixty <S%H3947><s%> years <S%H8346><s%> old; <S%H8141><s%> and she bore <S%H1121><s%> him Segub. <S%H3205><s%>
And Segub <S%H7687><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Jair, <S%H2971><s%> who had <S%H1961><s%> twenty-three cities <S%H5892><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Gilead. <S%H1568><s%>

But Geshur <S%H1650><s%> and Aram <S%H758><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the towns <S%H2333><s%> of Jair <S%H2971><s%> from them, with Kenath <S%H7079><s%> and its villages, <S%H1323><s%> [even] sixty <S%H8346><s%> cities. <S%H5892><s%> All <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> were the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Machir, <S%H4353><s%> the father of Gilead. <S%H1><s%>

And after <S%H310><s%> the death <S%H4194><s%> of Hezron <S%H2696><s%> in Caleb-ephrathah, Abijah, <S%H29><s%> Hezron's wife, <S%H802><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> him Ashhur <S%H806><s%> the father of Tekoa. <S%H1><s%>

Now the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jerahmeel <S%H3396><s%> the first-born of Hezron <S%H2696><s%> [were] Ram <S%H7410><s%> the first-born, then Bunah, <S%H946><s%> Oren, <S%H767><s%> Ozem, <S%H684><s%> [and] Ahijah. <S%H281><s%>
And Jerahmeel <S%H3396><s%> had <S%H1961><s%> another <S%H312><s%> wife, <S%H802><s%> whose name <S%H8034><s%> was Atarah; <S%H5851><s%> she was the mother <S%H517><s%> of Onam. <S%H208><s%>
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ram, <S%H7410><s%> the first-born of Jerahmeel, <S%H3396><s%> were Maaz, <S%H4619><s%> Jamin, <S%H3226><s%> and Eker. <S%H6134><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Onam <S%H208><s%> were Shammai <S%H8060><s%> and Jada. <S%H3047><s%> And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shammai <S%H8060><s%> [were] Nadab <S%H5070><s%> and Abishur. <S%H51><s%>
And the name <S%H8034><s%> of Abishur's wife <S%H802><s%> [was] Abihail, <S%H32><s%> and she bore <S%H3205><s%> him Ahban <S%H257><s%> and Molid. <S%H4140><s%>
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Nadab <S%H5070><s%> [were] Seled <S%H5540><s%> and Appaim, <S%H649><s%> and Seled <S%H5540><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> without <S%H3808><s%> sons. <S%H1121><s%>

And the son <S%H1121><s%> of Appaim <S%H649><s%> [was] Ishi. <S%H3469><s%> And the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ishi <S%H3469><s%> [was] Sheshan. <S%H8348><s%> And the son <S%H1121><s%> of Sheshan <S%H8348><s%> [was] Ahlai. <S%H304><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jada <S%H3047><s%> the brother <S%H251><s%> of Shammai <S%H8060><s%> [were] Jether <S%H3500><s%> and Jonathan, <S%H3083><s%> and Jether <S%H3500><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> without <S%H3808><s%> sons. <S%H1121><s%>
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> [were] Peleth <S%H6431><s%> and Zaza. <S%H2117><s%> These <S%H428><s%> were the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jerahmeel. <S%H3396><s%>

Now Sheshan <S%H8348><s%> had <S%H1961><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> sons, <S%H1121><s%> only <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> daughters. <S%H1323><s%> And Sheshan <S%H8348><s%> had an Egyptian <S%H4713><s%> servant <S%H5650><s%> whose name <S%H8034><s%> was Jarha. <S%H3398><s%>
And Sheshan <S%H8348><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> his daughter <S%H1323><s%> to Jarha <S%H3398><s%> his servant <S%H5650><s%> in marriage, <S%H802><s%> and she bore <S%H3205><s%> him Attai. <S%H6262><s%>
And Attai <S%H6262><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Nathan, <S%H5416><s%> and Nathan <S%H5416><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Zabad, <S%H2066><s%>
and Zabad <S%H2066><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Ephlal, <S%H654><s%> and Ephlal <S%H654><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Obed, <S%H5744><s%>
and Obed <S%H5744><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Jehu, <S%H3058><s%> and Jehu <S%H3058><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Azariah, <S%H5838><s%>
and Azariah <S%H5838><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Helez, <S%H2503><s%> and Helez <S%H2503><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Eleasah, <S%H501><s%>
and Eleasah <S%H501><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Sismai, <S%H5581><s%> and Sismai <S%H5581><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Shallum, <S%H7967><s%>
and Shallum <S%H7967><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Jekamiah, <S%H3359><s%> and Jekamiah <S%H3359><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Elishama. <S%H476><s%>

Now the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Caleb, <S%H3612><s%> the brother <S%H251><s%> of Jerahmeel, <S%H3396><s%> [were] Mesha <S%H4337><s%> his first-born, who <S%H1931><s%> was the father of Ziph; <S%H1><s%> and his son <S%H2128><s%> was Mareshah, <S%H1121><s%> the father of Hebron. <S%H4762><s%>
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hebron <S%H9116><s%> [were] Korah <S%H7141><s%> and Tappuah <S%H9647><s%> and Rekem <S%H7552><s%> and Shema. <S%H8087><s%>

And Shema <S%H8087><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Raham, <S%H7357><s%> the father of Jorkeam; <S%H1><s%> and Rekem <S%H3421><s%> became <S%H7552><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Shammai. <S%H3205><s%>
And the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shammai <S%H8060><s%> was Maon, <S%H4584><s%> and Maon <S%H4584><s%> [was] the father of Bethzur. <S%H1><s%>

And Ephah, <S%H5891><s%> Caleb's concubine, <S%H6370><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> Haran, <S%H9173><s%> Moza, <S%H4162><s%> and Gazez; <S%H1495><s%> and Haran <S%H9173><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Gazez. <S%H1495><s%>
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jahdai <S%H3056><s%> [were] Regem, <S%H7276><s%> Jotham, <S%H3147><s%> Geshan, <S%H1529><s%> Pelet, <S%H6404><s%> Ephah, <S%H5891><s%> and Shaaph. <S%H8174><s%>
Maacah, <S%H4601><s%> Caleb's concubine, <S%H6370><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> Sheber <S%H7669><s%> and Tirhanah. <S%H8647><s%>

She also bore <S%H3205><s%> Shaaph <S%H8174><s%> the father of Madmannah, <S%H1><s%> Sheva <S%H4089><s%> the father of Machbena <S%H7724><s%> and the father of Gibea; <S%H1><s%> and the daughter <S%H4343><s%> of Caleb <S%H1><s%> [was] Achsah. <S%H1388><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> were the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Caleb. <S%H3612><s%> The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hur, <S%H2354><s%> the first-born of Ephrathah, <S%H672><s%> [were] Shobal <S%H7732><s%> the father of Kiriath-jearim,
Salma <S%H8007><s%> the father of Bethlehem <S%H1><s%> [and] Hareph <S%H1035><s%> the father of Beth-gader.
And Shobal <S%H7732><s%> the father of Kiriath-jearim had <S%H1><s%> sons: <S%H1961><s%> Haroeh, <S%H1121><s%> half <S%H7204><s%> of the Manahathites, <S%H2677><s%>

and the families <S%H4940><s%> of Kiriath-jearim: the Ithrites, <S%H3505><s%> the Puthites, <S%H6336><s%> the Shumathites, <S%H8126><s%> and the Mishraites; <S%H4954><s%> from these <S%H428><s%> came <S%H3318><s%> the Zorathites <S%H6882><s%> and the Eshtaolites. <S%H848><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Salma <S%H8007><s%> [were] Bethlehem <S%H1035><s%> and the Netophathites, <S%H5200><s%> Atroth-beth-joab and half <S%H2677><s%> of the Manahathites, <S%H9274><s%> the Zorites. <S%H6882><s%>

And the families <S%H4940><s%> of scribes <S%H9373><s%> who lived <S%H3427><s%> at Jabez <S%H3258><s%> [were] the Tirathites, <S%H8654><s%> the Shimeathites, <S%H8101><s%> [and] the Sucathites. <S%H7756><s%> Those <S%H1992><s%> are the Kenites <S%H7017><s%> who came <S%H935><s%> from Hammath, <S%H9150><s%> the father of the house <S%H1><s%> of Rechab. <S%H1004><s%>
